item.title: OTN forums - different URL to get prompted to login less often
item.description:
I have a couple of OTN forums bookmarked, and found that generally every few hours I get signed out and end up viewing them as Guest. I then have to click on sign in, enter password, etc.

(Signing out this frequently is ridiculous, IMHO).

I found that instead of using the direct URL of a forum, eg: http://forums.oracle.com/forums/forum.jspa?forumID=378 if I use this form: http://forums.oracle.com/forums/adfAuthentication?success_url=https://rmoff.net/forum.jspa?forumID=378 then I end up signed in more often, and if I’ve been signed out then it goes straight to the login page and then through to the forum.

item.title: Google and Korean OTN forums
item.description:
Why does Google more often than not return the korean (kr) version of OTN forums for a match, but not english?

If I search Google for “Send notification:” “oracle.ons.Notification” the top hit is for kr.forums.oracle.com/forums/thread.jspa?threadID=650662

If you strip the kr from the URL you get this, which makes more sense given the locality when doing the search in Google.

Only mildly irritating, but odd behaviour nonetheless
